Player - Class in game_model
The Player class represents a player in the game, managing the player's cards, turn status, and actions.
Player() - Constructor for class game_model.Player
Constructs a new Player object with an empty list of cards.
Player(String) - Constructor for class game_model.Player
Constructs a new Player object with a given name.
PlayerPanel - Class in gui
The PlayerPanel class represents the panel for the human player, displaying the player's cards and control buttons (Draw and Say UNO).
PlayerPanel(Player) - Constructor for class gui.PlayerPanel
Constructs a PlayerPanel for the given player.
playPC(ViewCard) - Method in class game_model.Game
Plays a card for the CPU.
playThisCard(ViewCard) - Method in class Controller.Rules
Requests to play a card and performs necessary checks and actions.
